gaps: Experience with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD pipelines is only partially met.

Knowledge of system design patterns and best practices is a nice-to-have and not a must-have.

Solid understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis).
qa_suggestions: Consider additional technical assessments to evaluate proficiency in version control and CI/CD.

Assess the candidate's experience with system design patterns during the interview.
